desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>高爆榴弹塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，造成范围伤害。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>HE Grenade Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range to deal area DMG.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>高爆榴弹塔</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>HE Grenade Towers</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>“毒沼”MK-Ⅰ</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，造成范围伤害及减速效果。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Marsh Gas Mk I</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range to deal area DMG and apply slow.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>“毒沼”MK-Ⅰ</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Marsh Gas Mk I</>

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>管道准入口</>的使用权限；
管道准入口可限制管道内允许通过的物质，并限制可通过的数量。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Pipe Control Port</>. 
Pipe Control Ports can exclude certain materials from being moved in the pipelines as well as the quantity that can be moved within it.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以放置<@tech.get>管道准入口</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Pipe Control Ports</> can now be placed and used

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>拆解机</>；
拆解机可以对物品进行物理拆分，比如将装有液体的瓶子拆分为空瓶子与液体。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Separating Unit</>. 
Separating Units can physically separate certain items, such as a bottled fluid, into the empty bottle and its fluid contents.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>拆解机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>给水器</>；
给水器通电后，可<@tech.key>将液体释放到场景中</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Fluid Supply Unit</>. 
When connected to the power grid, the Fluid Supply Unit can <@tech.key>dispense fluids into the map</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>给水器</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Fluid Supply Units</>

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>灌装机的液体模式</>；
通过解锁液体模式，可进行与液体相关的不同配方生产，典型产物为<@tech.key>装有芽针溶液</>的<@tech.key>蓝铁瓶</>。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock <@tech.key>Fluid Mode for the Filling Unit</>. 
Once unlocked, Fluid Mode lets you produce fluid-related formulas. Typical product: <@tech.key>Yazhen Solution</> in <@tech.key>Ferrium Bottles</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>灌装机</>切换至<@tech.get>液体模式</>了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>Filling Unit</> can now be switched to <@tech.get>Fluid Mode</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>储液罐</>；
储液罐可储存<@tech.key>单一类型的液体</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Fluid Tank</>. 
A Fluid Tank can store <@tech.key>1 type of fluid</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>储液罐</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>仓库存取线基段</>和<@tech.key>仓库存取线源桩</>。
可以在集成核心区域放置仓库存取线基段，需要和仓库存取线源桩或其他生效的仓库存取线基段相连，其上可贴靠仓库存货口和仓库取货口。
desc.en: Research this to construct <@tech.key>Depot Bus Sections</> and <@tech.key>Depot Bus Ports</>. A bus section that can be deployed in the Core AIC Area. The Depot Bus Section must be connected to a Depot Bus Port or other active Depot Bus Sections. Once active, Depot Loaders and Depot Unloaders can be attached to the Depot Bus.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.key>仓库存取线基段</>和<@tech.key>仓库存取线源桩</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.key>Depot Bus Sections</> and <@tech.key>Depot Bus Ports</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>反应池</>；
反应池可将材料进行<@tech.key>反应</>或将固体溶解在液体中，典型产物为<@tech.key>锦草溶液</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Reactor Crucible</>. The Reactor Crucible can perform <@tech.key>reactions</> or dissolve solids to make solutions. 
Typical product: <@tech.key>Jincao Solution</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>反应池</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>管道</>的使用权限；
管道可将货物<@tech.key>自动从设备的管道输出口输送到下个设备的管道输入口</>。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Pipes</>. 
Pipes can <@tech.key>automatically transport fluids from a pipe outlet of a facility to a pipe inlet of another</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以放置<@tech.get>管道</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Pipes</> can now be placed and used

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>种植机的液体模式</>；
通过解锁液体模式，可产出依赖液体的新植物成株。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock <@tech.key>Fluid Mode for the Planting Unit</>. 
Once unlocked, Fluid Mode lets you grow new crops that are dependent on fluids.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>种植机</>切换至<@tech.get>液体模式</>了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>Planting Unit</> can now be switched to <@tech.get>Fluid Mode</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>息壤中继器</>和<@tech.key>息壤供电桩</>。
<@tech.key>息壤中继器</>在集成核心区域外可自动连接协议核心与全部息壤电力设备（80m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行电力传输与小范围供电。
<@tech.key>息壤供电桩</>在集成核心区域外可自动连接协议核心与息壤中继器（80m内）、息壤供电桩以及其他电力设备（30m内），但无法连接核心区域内的其他电力设备。在集成核心区域内仅会自动连接协议核心。可进行范围供电与短距离电力传输。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Xiranite Relays</> and <@tech.key>Xiranite Pylons</>.
<@tech.key>Xiranite Relays</> placed outside the Core AIC Area auto-connect to the PAC and any Xiranite power facilities within an 80-meter radius, but cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. They can be used for power transmission and powering facilities within a short range.
<@tech.key>Xiranite Pylons</> placed outside the Core AIC Area auto-connect to the PAC and Xiranite Relays within an 80-meter radius; and to Xiranite Pylons and other power facilities within a 30-meter radius. However, they cannot connect to other power facilities within the Core AIC Area. When placed inside the Core AIC Area, they only auto-connect to the PAC. They can be used for powering facilities within range and power transmission across short distances.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>息壤中继器</>和<@tech.get>息壤供电桩</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Xiranite Relays</> and <@tech.get>Xiranite Pylons</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>水泵</>；
水泵通电后，可<@tech.key>在液体源附近进行液体抽取</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Fluid Pump</>. 
When connected to the power grid, the Fluid Pump can <@tech.key>extract fluids from a nearby source</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>水泵</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>管道分流器</>、<@tech.key>管道桥</>、<@tech.key>管道汇流器</>的使用权限；
管道分流器可将单一管道<@tech.key>分流出最多3条管道</>进行传输。
管道桥可使得<@tech.key>两条交叉管道进行传输</>而互不影响。
管道汇流器可将最多3条管道并入1条管道进行传输。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Pipe Splitters</>, <@tech.key>Pipe Bridges</>, and <@tech.key>Pipe Convergers</>. 
Pipe Splitters can <@tech.key>split 1 pipeline into 2 or 3 pipelines</> to divide fluid flow. 
Pipe Bridges let <@tech.key>a pipeline cross over another intersecting pipeline</> without interfering fluid flows of both. 
Pipe Convergers can merge fluid flows of up to 3 pipelines into 1.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以放置<@tech.get>管道分流器</>、<@tech.get>管道桥</>、<@tech.get>管道汇流器</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Pipe Splitters</>, <@tech.get>Pipe Bridges</>, and <@tech.get>Pipe Convergers</> can now be placed and used

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>天有洪炉</>；
天有洪炉可以生产<@tech.key>息壤</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Forges of the Sky</>. 
Forges of the Sky can produce <@tech.key>Xiranite</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>天有洪炉</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Forges of the Sky</>

desc.cn: 研究后可在武陵地区放置的<@tech.key>天有洪炉</>数量上限<@tech.key>+1</>。
desc.en: Research this to raise the limit of <@tech.key>Forges of the Sky</> in Wuling by <@tech.key>+1</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在武陵地区放置更多的<@tech.key>天有洪炉</>了
unlockDesc.en: More <@tech.key>Forges of the Sky</> can now be placed in Wuling.

desc.cn:
研究后可扩增<@tech.key>反应池的更多反应缓存</>；
扩增反应缓存后，单一反应池同一时间可<@tech.key>进行更多配方反应</>。
desc.en:
Research this to <@tech.key>expand the reaction cache of the Reactor Crucible</>. 
Expanding the cache allows a single Reactor Crucible to perform <@tech.key>additional reaction formulas</> at the same time.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在<@tech.get>反应池</>增加至<@tech.get>5个反应区域</>让配方同时发生反应了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>Reactor Crucible</> now has <@tech.get>5 reaction slots</> for accommodating concurrent reactions.

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>洒水机</>；
洒水机在可为需要对应液体的目标进行<@tech.key>对应液体的喷洒</>；如果对应目标没有需求的液体则会智能停止喷洒。
desc.en:
Research this to construct the <@tech.key>Sprinkler</>. 
Sprinklers can <@tech.key>sprinkle fluids</> at targets that require them. Sprinklers will also automatically stop sprinkling if their targets no longer require fluids.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>洒水机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>医疗塔</>；
医疗塔在<@tech.key>在有能源供给情况下</>可为当前编队干员进行<@tech.key>生命值回复</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Medical Towers</>. 
Medical Towers <@tech.key>with a power supply</> can <@tech.key>restore the HP</> of active operators in the team.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>医疗塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>铳械塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Gun Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>铳械塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>配件机</>；
配件机可将材料进行<@tech.key>配件</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>紫晶零件</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Fitting Units</>.
The Fitting Unit can <@tech.key>fit</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Amethyst Parts</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>配件机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>供电桩</>；
供电桩可在<@tech.key>通电后</>为范围内的设备进行供电。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Electric Pylons</>. 
An Electric Pylon <@tech.key>connected to the power grid</> can supply power to nearby facilities.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>供电桩</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>精炼炉</>；
精炼炉可将材料进行<@tech.key>精炼</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>晶体外壳</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Refining Units</>. 
The Refining Unit can <@tech.key>refine</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Origocrusts</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>精炼炉</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>粉碎机</>；
粉碎机可将材料进行<@tech.key>粉碎</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>晶体外壳粉末</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Shredding Units</>. 
The Shredding Unit can <@tech.key>shred</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Origocrust Powder</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>粉碎机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>便携源石矿机</>；
便携源石矿机可<@tech.key>开采矿物且无需电力</>；
典型矿物为<@tech.key>源矿</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Portable Originium Rigs</>. 
The Portable Originium Rig <@tech.key>does not require electrical power to work</> and mines minerals such as <@tech.key>Originium Ore</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>便携源石矿机</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Portable Originium Rigs</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>中继器</>；
中继器可在<@tech.key>更大范围内进行电路连接</>，但无法为范围内设备供电。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Relay Towers</>. 
The Relay Tower can achieve <@tech.key>long distance power transmission</> but cannot supply power to nearby facilities.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>中继器</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>塑形机</>；
塑形机可将材料进行<@tech.key>塑形</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>紫晶质瓶</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Moulding Units</>. 
The Moulding Unit can <@tech.key>mould</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Amethyst Bottles</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>塑形机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>协议储存箱</>；
协议储存箱可存放物品，并在<@tech.key>通电后</>可以将储存物品以一定间隔<@tech.key>传输回仓库</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Protocol Stashes</>. 
The Protocol Stash can be used to store items. When <@tech.key>powered</>, this facility can <@tech.key>instantly transfer items to the Depot</> on a regular basis.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>协议储存箱</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>装备原件机</>；
装备原件机可将材料进行<@tech.key>装件</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>紫晶装备原件</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Gearing Units</>. 
The Gearing Unit can <@tech.key>assemble</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Amethyst Component</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>装备原件机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>封装机</>；
封装机可将材料进行<@tech.key>封装</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>低容谷地电池</>与<@tech.key>工业爆炸物</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Packaging Units</>. 
The Packaging Unit can <@tech.key>package</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>LC Valley Batteries</> and <@tech.key>Industrial Explosives</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>封装机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>榴弹塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，造成范围伤害。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Grenade Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range to deal area DMG.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>榴弹塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>液氮塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，并对敌人造成减速效果。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>LN Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range and slows them down.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>液氮塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>射线塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，攻击速度较慢。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Beam Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range. It has a slower rate of attack.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>射线塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>传送带</>的使用权限；
传送带可将货物<@tech.key>自动从设备输出口输送到下个设备的输入口</>。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Transport Belts</>. 
Transport Belts can <@tech.key>automatically transport goods from the output port of one facility to the input port of another</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>集成核心区域</>放置<@tech.get>初级传送带</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Basic Transport Belts</> can now be placed in the <@tech.get>Core AIC Area</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>便捷存取站</>；
在通电状态下可以<@tech.key>远程存取仓库的物品</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Easy Stashes</>. 
When powered, the stash can <@tech.key>remotely transfer items to and from the Depot</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>便捷存取站</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>物品准入口</>的使用权限；
物品准入口可限制传送带上允许通过的物品，并限制可通过的数量。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Item Control Ports</>. 
Item Control Ports can exclude certain items from being moved on the transport belt as well as the quantity that can be moved upon it.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>集成核心区域</>放置<@tech.get>物品准入口</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Item Control Ports</> can now be placed in the <@tech.get>Core AIC Area</>

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>物流桥</>的使用权限；
物流桥可使得<@tech.key>两条交叉传送带进行传输</>而互不影响。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Belt Bridges</>. 
The Belt Bridge allows <@tech.key>a transport belt to cross over another intersecting belt</> without interfering the product flows of both.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>集成核心区域</>放置<@tech.get>物流桥</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Belt Bridges</> can now be placed in the <@tech.get>Core AIC Area</>

desc.cn: 发电功率到达250
desc.en: Reach power output of 250

desc.cn: 研究后可解锁<@tech.key>供电桩</>的<@tech.key>电力运输</>功能。
desc.en: Research this to unlock the <@tech.key>power transmission</> feature of <@tech.key>Electric Pylons</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以用<@tech.get>供电桩</>进行<@tech.get>电力运输</>了。

desc.cn: 推进任务「集成管家」以解锁
desc.en: Mission progress: AIC Steward

desc.cn: 研究后可解锁仓库存取线的升级权限。可<@tech.key>使用仓库存取线</>将物品取出或存入仓库，可制造<@tech.key>仓库存货口与仓库取货口</>。
desc.en: Research this to unlock the authority level for Depot Bus upgrades. This lets you <@tech.key>utilize the Depot Bus</> for moving items in and out of the depot, and construct <@tech.key>Depot Loaders/Unloaders</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>仓库存货口</>与<@tech.get>仓库取货口</>并使用仓库存取线了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Depot Loaders</> and <@tech.get>Depot Unloaders</>, and make use of the Depot Bus.

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>灌装机</>；
灌装机可将材料进行<@tech.key>灌装</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>荞愈胶囊</>和<@tech.key>柑实罐头</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Filling Units</>. 
The Filling Unit can <@tech.key>fill</> containers to make products such as <@tech.key>Buck Capsules</> and <@tech.key>Canned Citrome [C]</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>灌装机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>留言信标</>；
可以用来<@tech.key>留下标记信息</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Memo Beacons</>. 
The Memo Beacon can be used to post and leave <@tech.key>beacon memos</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>留言信标</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>电驱矿机</>；
电驱矿机可<@tech.key>在野外无线传输矿物至仓库</>；
可采集更稀有的矿藏，典型矿物为<@tech.key>紫晶矿</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Electric Mining Rigs</>. 
The Electric Mining Rig uses <@tech.key>belt-free transfer to deliver ore directly to the Depot</>. 
These rigs can mine rarer minerals such as <@tech.key>Amethyst Ore</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>电驱矿机</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Electric Mining Rigs</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>采种机</>与<@tech.key>种植机</>；
采种机可将普通植物进行<@tech.key>采种</>，可产出对应植物的种子；
种植机可将普通种子进行<@tech.key>种植</>，可产出对应植物成株。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Seed-Picking Units</> and <@tech.key>Planting Units</>. 
The Seed-Picking Unit can harvest <@tech.key>seeds</> or similar materials from crops. 
The Planting Unit can <@tech.key>plant</> seeds and raise them to mature crops.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>采种机</>与<@tech.get>种植机</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Seed-Picking Units</> and <@tech.get>Planting Units</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>热能池</>；
热能池可消耗<@tech.key>源矿</>或<@tech.key>电池</>进行发电，但<@tech.key>需要接入电网</>整流后才能工作。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Thermal Banks</> that consume <@tech.key>Originium Ore</> or <@tech.key>Batteries</> to generate power. 
Thermal Banks <@tech.key>must be connected to the power grid</> to work.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>热能池</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>分流器</>的使用权限；
分流器可将单一传送带<@tech.key>分流出最多3条传送带</>进行传输。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Splitters</>. 
The Splitter can <@tech.key>split 1 belt into 2 or 3 belts</> to divide product flow.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>集成核心区域</>放置<@tech.get>分流器</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Splitters</> can now be placed in the <@tech.get>Core AIC Area</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>滑索架</>；
两个滑索架之间可进行<@tech.key>快速远距离移动</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Zipline Pylons</>. 
Create a zipline with 2 Zipline Pylons to <@tech.key>zip quickly between these pylons</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>滑索架</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>电涌塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人，攻击对多个目标造成伤害。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Surge Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range. Its attack can hit multiple units at once.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>电涌塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>全向声波塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会以一定间隔对附近范围内的敌人造成晕眩。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Omnidirectional Sonic Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower periodically stuns enemies within the area of effect.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>全向声波塔</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Omnidirectional Sonic Towers</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>哨戒塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近较大范围内的敌人，并优先攻击威胁较高的敌人。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Sentry Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within a substantial range, and prioritizes its attacks on high threat enemies.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>哨戒塔</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>扩装铳械塔</>；
在有能源供给的情况下会自动攻击附近范围内的敌人。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Heavy Gun Towers</>. 
When powered, the tower automatically attacks enemies within range.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>扩装铳械塔</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Heavy Gun Towers</>

desc.cn:
研究后可解锁<@tech.key>汇流器</>的使用权限；
汇流器可将最多3条传送带并入1条传送带进行传输。
desc.en:
Research this to unlock authority level access to <@tech.key>Convergers</>. 
The Converger can merge up to 3 belts into 1 single belt to combine product flows.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>集成核心区域</>放置<@tech.get>汇流器</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Convergers</> can now be placed in the <@tech.get>Core AIC Area</>

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>二型电驱矿机</>；
二型电驱矿机可<@tech.key>在野外无线传输矿物至仓库</>；
可采集更稀有的矿藏，典型矿物为<@tech.key>蓝铁矿</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Electric Mining Rigs Mk II</>. 
The Electric Mining Rig Mk II can use <@tech.key>belt-free transfer to deliver ore directly to the Depot</>. 
These rigs can mine even rarer minerals such as <@tech.key>Ferrium Ore</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>二型电驱矿机</>并使用了
unlockDesc.en: The <@tech.get>PAC</> can now construct <@tech.get>Electric Mining Rigs Mk II</>

desc.cn: 发电功率到达1000
desc.en: Reach power output of 1000

desc.cn: 研究后可解锁<@tech.key>中继器</>的<@tech.key>范围供电</>功能。
desc.en: Research this to unlock the <@tech.key>area power supply</> feature of <@tech.key>Relay Towers</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以用<@tech.get>中继器</>进行<@tech.get>范围供电</>了。
unlockDesc.en: <@tech.get>Relay Towers</> can now <@tech.get>supply power to a small area</>.

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>研磨机</>；
研磨机可将材料进行<@tech.key>研磨</>，典型产物为<@tech.key>致密源石粉末</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Grinding Units</>. 
The Grinding Unit can <@tech.key>grind</> materials to make products such as <@tech.key>Dense Originium Powder</>.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>研磨机</>并使用了

desc.cn:
研究后可制造<@tech.key>长距滑索架</>；
两个长距滑索架之间可进行<@tech.key>更远距离的快速移动</>，且可在多个长距滑索间进行<@tech.key>连续移动</>。
desc.en:
Research this to construct <@tech.key>Zipline Towers</>. 
Create an even longer zipline with 2 Zipline Towers to <@tech.key>zip quickly across greater distances</>. You can also set up a continuous <@tech.key>zipline route</> with multiple Zipline Towers.

unlockDesc.cn: 现在可以在<@tech.get>协议核心</>制造<@tech.get>长距滑索架</>并使用了
